thread.title: Joe Jonas, Demi Lovato tease fans with ‘Camp Rock 3′
thread.title_full: Joe Jonas, Demi Lovato tease fans with ‘Camp Rock 3′

author: gcatolico
title: Joe Jonas, Demi Lovato tease fans with ‘Camp Rock 3′
text:
Joe Jonas, Demi Lovato tease fans with ‘Camp Rock 3′ INQUIRER.net / 09:10   
— J O E J O N A S (@joejonas) February 12, 2017 ADVERTISEMENT 
It was a warm, sunny day when Joe Jonas reunited with his former “Camp Rock” leading lady, singer Demi Lovato, and fans of the well-loved Disney musical movie were screaming with joy. 
While chilling at the Roc Nation Pre-Grammy Brunch on Saturday in Los Angeles, California, the DNCE lead vocalist, 27, snapped a selfie with Lovato with the caption “CR3?” on Twitter and Instagram . The “Stone Cold” songstress, 24, liked and retweeted Jonas’ selfie. 
Their wild and nostalgic fans began taking up arms on social media, begging the duo to cap the “Camp Rock” musical saga with a third film. “Is she still the voice inside your head, the reason that you’re singing?” one asked. Some sensitive fans even “scolded” Jonas for his unholy joke. 
“Don’t play with a Camp Rock fan, man!” one user yelled. @joejonas You can't joke about these things, Joseph. 
— Alex Goldschmidt (@alexandergold) February 12, 2017 @joejonas @ddlovato DON'T PLAY WITH A CAMP ROCK FAN, MAN!! 
— Conexão Lovato (@siteclovato) February 12, 2017 @joejonas @ddlovato is she still the voice inside your head, the reason that you're singing? 
— hayley (@breakthewarning) February 12, 2017 
In 2008, Lovato breathed life into the character of budding rock star Mitchie Torres in “Camp Rock.” Jonas played the role of heartthrob singer Shane Gray while his two brothers, Nick Jonas and Kevin Jonas, appeared in the film. 
In the 2010 sequel “Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam,” the pair reprised their roles and has, since then, managed to stay as close friends, Entertainment Tonight reported. 
Jonas hopped in with Lovato by jamming with her on her global tours. In return, Lovato toured with Nick Jonas last year. Gianna Francesca Catolico RELATED STORIES
